name: Abi
description: Abi is a project that brings a fresh perspective to the crypto. The core of the Abi project is a community-driven token that not only embraces the fun and energy of meme culture but also serves as a bridge between digital and real-world connections. Abi aims to bring people together across Web2 and Web3, making it accessible for newcomers and crypto enthusiasts alike to connect, share experiences, and celebrate the relationships that shape us.
